General.Name: Katoro Gold plc
General.Description: Katoro Gold plc operates as a gold and nickel exploration and development company in the United Kingdom, Cyprus, South Africa, and Tanzania. The company primarily explores for nickel, platinum group metals, copper, and gold deposits. It holds 65% interest in the Haneti project covering an area of approximately 5,000 square kilometers located in central Tanzania; and Blyvoor Tailings project located in South Africa. In addition, it holds interest in the Trans Namibian Mining and Minerals project located in Namibia. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 60 Gracechurch Street, London, United Kingdom, EC4V 0HR
